svg.text: WT32-ETH01 ‚Üí HUB75 64√ó32 | Wiring & Pinout | ‚ö† BOOT MODE: IO0 ‚Üí 10kŒ© ‚Üí GND
Misc pads (solder points on board bottom):
IO0 ‚Üí 10kŒ© ‚Üí GND (BOOT MODE only ‚Äî remove for run)
TX0 (IO1) ‚Üí USB-UART RX (= LAT in run)
OE ‚Üí tied to GND on panel
R1=IO2 G1=IO15 B1=IO4 | R2=IO5 G2=IO17 B2=IO12
A=IO33 B=IO32 C=IO13 D=IO14 | CLK=IO16 LAT=IO1 OE=GND
